snippet: The videos for Christine C. Quinn, who officially announced her candidacy for mayor on Sunday and does not speak Spanish, are dissimilar in length and details.
abstract: The videos for Christine C. Quinn, who officially announced her candidacy for mayor on Sunday and does not speak Spanish, are dissimilar in length and details.

byline.original: By DAVID W. CHEN and FRANCES ROBLES

headline.main: A Slip-Up Is Just One Difference Between English and Spanish Videos for Quinn
